attributes.action: Reduce the price of the childhood favourite 'Space Raider' crisps, back down to 10 pence from 15 pence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Recently we were shocked and saddened to hear that the classic 'Space Raiders' crisps, were increased from 10 pence a packet to 15 pence a packet. This is a snack that was enjoyed by thousands of people, not only in their younger years, but also as an adult too! 
Not only has our fond memories of something that has such a close place to the heart of many been tainted, it is also an example of the outrage we live in that is 'inflation'. Is it not bad enough that we are stung in every other possible way when it comes to price increase? 
This now has gone too far and we urge you, please Mr Prime Minister, please give us back our 10 pence Space Raiders?

Please understand that this is not a joke and there is currently an internet group with over 31,000 members who are all against this increase. We feel that now inflation is affecting those things that are available directly to children and this seriously needs to be addressed!

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
